dcterms:creator: Julián Zapata
dcterms:description: A dataset used for assessing the performance of automatic speech recognition systems in dictation workflows, specifically focusing on the interaction between native and non-native speakers of three major languages.
dcterms:title: Dictation Workflows

dcterms:creator: Julián Zapata
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating the performance of ASR systems in translation dictation workflows, focusing on the interaction between native and non-native speakers of three major languages.
dcterms:title: Translation Dictation Workflows

dcterms:creator: Julián Zapata
dcterms:description: A dataset used for assessing the performance of ASR systems in medical dictation workflows, focusing on the interaction between native and non-native speakers of three major languages.
dcterms:title: Medical Dictation Workflows
